title: Pig too far gone

abstract: The one agent who can blend into any scene.
description: Chief Kosher is having a hard time busting open a crime ring and nabbing the King Pin, when the cops he sends undercover find it impossible to go unnoticed. His only option is to send in loose-cannon McBurger, which could be his best or worst decision to date.
